entry.title: King & Court
entry.summary:
Author: BeautifulFiction

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 123,672Chapters: 29/?Kudos: 1,343

Summary: Loneliness is an insidious thing. When Merlin looks at Arthur, he sees not just a prince waiting for his time to rule, but a young man struggling to find his place in the world, with little help from anyone else.The truth is, Arthur needs more than the friendship Merlin can offer. He needs people he can trust: men and women who will become his court and his confidants, and if he is going to survive to take the throne and lead Camelot into its golden age, he needs them sooner rather than later.Finding loopholes in Uther’s laws is no easy feat. Court life is a dangerous game, but it’s one Merlin has every intention of winning so that Arthur can have knights of his choosing by his side.And then there is the matter of his magic…

entry.title: A Magician and his King
entry.summary:
Author: Eliott_Marsh

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 1,852Chapters: 4/?Kudos: 7

Summary: I’m rewatching the show right now, and after I rewatch an episode, I’m writing a scene (or a few) that kind of fit into the original plot, but if Merthur (and some other things) were canon. I’m only on episode three now, and it’s in progress so I can’t really say definitely EXACTLY where it’s headed at the moment. I'm just having fun with it really!There will be different POV's throughout, though I will rarely stray from Merlin, Morgana, Arthur, and Gwen's perspectives.((Will be updating with "chapters" and changes to the summary/tags as the work rounds out))

entry.title: Ephemeral (echoes of us)
entry.summary:
Author: gigiLemon

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 26,007Chapters: 5/5Kudos: 97

Summary: A magical trap Arthur runs into sends him hurtling into a world that looks exactly like his own. With one teeny exception; there is no one. Not a single soul.It is just him and all of empty Camelot, all by his lonesome self. All he has to do is figure out a way to break the enchantment.Oh, and bloody Merlin’s there too.-OR-Arthur and Merlin are stuck together until they find a way to break the enchantment and return home. And soft and noble Arthur learns to let go and give into his fantasies.Forced proximity.

entry.title: A Dream of Spring
entry.summary:
Author: OnceUponBacktoTheFuture

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 11,952Chapters: 19/38Kudos: 23

Summary: When Camelot falls to a cruel king, Arthur and Merlin must find and rally their scattered friends to take back the kingdom. But after Arthur discovers Merlin's secret, he begins to see him differently. Can Arthur accept who they both are, or will they get lost in this new and dangerous Camelot, crawling with nightmares and daydreams, old friends and new enemies?

entry.title: From Fire by Fire
entry.summary:
Author: guinever

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 6,725Chapters: 2/14Kudos: 16

Summary: “Merlin. Even if you’re … even if you’re right, it doesn’t matter. It’s too late. He’s going to kill me. And I—listen to me, you idiot. I don’t want you to watch. And I don’t want you to be next.” orAfter confronting Morgause's vision of his mother, Arthur rides for Camelot, intending to make his father pay for his hypocrisy. He falls short of luck, for the King has fallen back on the counsel of his faithful Witchfinder, Aredian, who is convinced that Arthur is not Arthur, the crown prince, but a changeling, bound to Morgause's will and let loose upon Camelot to usurp Uther of his crown.As Arthur is dragged away to the dungeons, sentenced to a death by fire, Merlin must race against time to change the course of events which seem to spell out Arthur's demise. Time is scarce, however, and for all intents and purposes, it might be too late already.

entry.title: hot trash for 1484 years and counting
entry.summary:
Author: heartofgold_22

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 5,315Chapters: 2/?Kudos: 35

Summary: In a modern world with modern magic, one Merlin Emrys is going about his long, immortal life, waiting patiently for the sea change that will preface Arthur’s return.But then a giant lizard appears out of the sewers. And several goblins rob a bank. And a troll impersonates the Prime Minister. And suddenly the world changes.Madness comes from within, and delusions of immortality are not uncommon. Maybe this is the end. It is probably the beginning.

entry.title: Only the Cave Remembers
entry.summary:
Author: rousse_aux_yeux_verts

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 12,621Chapters: 6/10Kudos: 19

Summary: A hidden cave, tucked away from the world, holds memories of Arthur and Merlin's most vulnerable moments — from stolen kisses and heated arguments to quiet nights of comfort and longing.Years pass, kingdoms rise and fall, and the world changes beyond recognition, but the cave remains the same — a timeless keeper of their love, pain, and all the unspoken words left behind.It's a story of love that never quite fit into the world around them, of two souls finding solace in a place where time seemed to stand still. Even as centuries go by, the cave remembers it all.Merlin belongs to BBC, I do not own it. I write just for fun.Actually the story is quite short, still I hope tag slow burn will suit here.

entry.title: Beneath the Roses
entry.summary:
Author: YellingAtPlants

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 5,830Chapters: 6/15Kudos: 29

Summary: Beneath the Roses, a companion to Not All Dragons and Dandelions, from Morgana and Gwen’s perspective.---Morgana has lived under Uther's oppressive rule for many years - she has learned how to hide, how to be quiet enough to slip under the radar and keep her role in the court. Her brother has been hurt, mentally and physically, but the last straw comes on his birthday, when his soulmate mark never appears. She worries for him, for his future in Camelot.So when the new mute serving boy arrives in Camelot and immediately saves his life, it changes everything.

entry.title: The Last Dragonlord (Translated to English)
entry.summary:
Author: La traductora (Botkabularia)

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 87,032Chapters: 8/24Kudos: 22

Summary: Located in a world divided into five houses, where summer can last for years but winter an eternity, and where the magic of the ancient religion is forbidden, there was a war known as "The Magic War," in which King Uther massacred the Emrys family, exiling them from the Iron Throne and proclaiming himself as the sole King of Camelot. Fifteen years later, when King Uther mysteriously dies and his son takes the throne, the world seems to be in chaos.Caerleon, the land of the north, is protected by a giant wall of ice to separate the five houses from the dark forces that dare to be in the Pale Forest, in order to preserve peace.If there was ever peace.With the death of King Uther, the war of the five houses for the Iron Throne seems more heated than ever.And not even the approaching winter can stop it. Puedes leer la versión en español aquí.

entry.title: Losing or gaining control (is sometimes closer to each other than you think)
entry.summary:
Author: sword_and_shield_22

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 66,545Chapters: 15/?Kudos: 46

Summary: Merlin has never learnt to control his magic. It is completely guided by his emotions and that usually doesn't turn out well.Arthur was chased out of Camelot as a young prince. His own sister killed their father and now he is just waiting for the right moment to reclaim his kingdom.When Merlin and Arthur meet, a hope seems to take root in the world that all will be well.Magical figures, dark magic, lies and betrayal make their experiences together anything but easy. But deep friendships, trust, loyalty and love bring them ever closer to their goal.Will Merlin find the control he needs and can Arthur forget his past to open his heart?

entry.title: The Final Sanctuary
entry.summary:
Author: BeautifulFiction

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 44,221Chapters: 9/12Kudos: 552

Summary: Perhaps he could have ignored the glittering motes of magic that danced through the room. He could have blamed this strange place of power for their presence, but he could not deny the truth that made itself plain before him, painted in blue eyes turned to bright, brazen gold. Merlin was a sorcerer. ---When Sir Leon is gravely injured, Arthur, Merlin and the knights seek shelter in an old Sanctuary cave, but the magic within is far from powerless, and the goddess is always watching. Can they overcome their fears and find their way back to freedom, or will they be lost forever in their own enmity?

entry.title: Do you feel like a young god?
entry.summary:
Author: MedaLeda

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 12,997Chapters: 1/3Kudos: 3

Summary: Deep in the forest an ancient temple slumbers, the legacy of a god carved into its walls, a promise of salvation and a promise of eternity.Arthur Pendragon didn't go looking for the prophecy of the Once and Future king, but when a stranger pushes it into his lap he can't let go. Who the hell is Emrys, and why would a sorcerer help him in the first place? The druids hold the key, but the path to discovery is long, and he may soon wish he'd never step foot on it all. When a tragic sacrifice is made, Arthur is left with a choice between betrayal and forgiveness, understanding and ignorance, love and hate.Meanwhile Merlin would follow his king anywhere, and he has. He could never bring himself to regret following Arthur that day, but he would always wonder how different life could have been if he had somehow convinced him to just go home. Tortured peasant boys don't make good Gods, and the consequences have the potential to change the world - if he could only escape the Sarrum long enough to try.or: The one where Emrys is a God and doesn't know it, Arthur pushes until he breaks, Sarrum is evil and Merlin never wanted any of this to happen. Mordred's just happy to be here.PRE WRITTEN

entry.title: The Space Between Us
entry.summary:
Author: ReyloTrash2187

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 89,842Chapters: 14/?Kudos: 366

Summary: Arthur Pendragon has spent his whole life untouched—by kindness, by desire, or anything resembling real intimacy. It never mattered. Not until a certain annoying manservant came to Camelot—Merlin—who disregarded all strict royal etiquette and showed no restraint when it came to sudden, reckless displays of affection. Now, there’s something impossible in the space between them, something Arthur doesn’t know how to name—only that he aches to close the distance.*A slow-burn touched-starved Arthur Pendragon story.*Guys, there was only one bed.Guys, some obscure quest in the cold far-up mountains made them "huddle for warmth".Guys, they might give in to this farm fantasy of theirs.Can't I just put all the tropes in there?This fic is rated MSI for Maximum Self Indulgence.

entry.title: Of Legends and (Rugby) Kings
entry.summary:
Author: grlnxtdr29

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 24,076Chapters: 9/35Kudos: 27

Summary: The problem with Legends is that, over time, they are altered, misremembered, or forgotten all together. But some Legends are so great, they must be relived, again and again, until they get it right.Nick dreams only of being the Rugby King of Truham Grammar. Beyond that, he has no idea what he wants to do with his future. Until he meets a boy with curly hair, blue eyes, and dimples.Charlie dreams of Dragons, and Magick, of brave Knights, and a quest set before him, to bring back the olde ways, and set right the Legend that has been retold thousands of times. This time, he vows to set the record straight (Or not so straight.)Who knew their Destinies would collide?
